channel.title: Hugo on Engineering Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Engineering Blog

item.title: Building my new blog: Part 1
item.description: I wanted to create a blog for a long time already, but because of university I had not much spare time. Finally I found some time to create my blog and this post will contain some background information about the software I’m using, where it’s hosted etc. Enjoy my first post! What to use Link to heading The first question I asked myself was: What software I’m going to use for my blog?
